column7: Kampot Provincial Police cooperated with the Department of Internal Security to crack down on drug trafficking by mail in Kampot Province. The raid occurred in 1 Usaphea Village
column9: Kampot City.------Police detained a suspect named as MATTHEW JAMES
column11: 33 years old (a British national) living in Andong Khmer Village
column14: and confiscated 258.18 grams of ecstasy powder (MDMA?).------The suspect has now been sent to the department for further proceedings. ------POST NEWS
